params.organizerId: The ID of the organizer being deregistered.

params.organizerAddress: The wallet address of the organizer.

returns.name: The name of the organizer.
returns.wallet: The wallet address of the organizer.

params.nominee: The address being nominated for organizer status.

params.tokenId: The token ID for which to set the URI

params.bio: The updated biography of the organizer.
params.name: The updated name of the organizer.
params.organizerId: The ID of the organizer whose profile is being updated.
params.wallet: The updated wallet for the organizer.

acceptNomination(string,string).notice: Accepts nomination for organizer status. Must be called by the nominee.

deregisterOrganizer(uint256).notice: Deregisters an organizer from the registry. Can only be called by the organizer themselves.

getOrganizer(address).notice: Retrieves information about an organizer based on their wallet address.

nominate(address).notice: Nominates an address for organizer status, can only be called by an existing organizer.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the URI for a given token ID
